languages.text: "Даруй вам Император милость никогда не узнать, что такое гостеприимство Инквизиции. Фроше, позаботься о нашем госте". {n}Голос Калькасара наделяет слугу феноменальной способностью перемещаться в пространстве — кружка оказывается перед вами прежде, чем успевает стихнуть голос Лорд-инквизитора.{/n}

"May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Даруй вам Император милость никогда не узнать, что такое гостеприимство Инквизиции. Фроше, позаботься о нашем госте". {n}Голос Калькасара наделяет слугу феноменальной способностью перемещаться в пространстве — кружка оказывается перед вами прежде, чем успевает стихнуть голос Лорд-инквизитора.{/n}

Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

languages.text: “愿帝皇保佑你，希望你永远不必亲身体验审判庭的热情。弗罗舍，招待一下我们的客人。”{n}卡尔卡扎的话语仿佛赋予了这位仆人瞬间移动的超能力一般。大审判官甚至连话音都还未落，一杯雷卡咖啡就忽然出现在了你的眼前。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇保佑你，希望你永远不必亲身体验审判庭的热情。弗罗舍，招待一下我们的客人。”{n}卡尔卡扎的话语仿佛赋予了这位仆人瞬间移动的超能力一般。审判长甚至连话音都还未落，一杯雷卡咖啡就忽然出现在了你的眼前。{/n}

languages.text: «Ruego al Emperador que nunca tenga ocasión de experimentar la hospitalidad de la Inquisición. Froscher, atienda a nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}». {n}La voz de Calcazar parece dotar a su sirviente de la habilidad de atravesar instantáneamente el espacio. Antes de que el Lord Inquisidor termine la frase, tienes delante una taza de café.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ruego al Emperador que nunca tenga ocasión de experimentar la hospitalidad de la Inquisición. Froscher, atienda a nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}». {n}La voz de Calcazar parece dotar a su sirviente de la habilidad de atravesar instantáneamente el espacio. Antes de que el Lord Inquisidor termine la frase, tienes delante una taza de café.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前が異端審問庁のもてなしを受ける機会が万が一にも起きぬよう、皇帝の御慈悲を祈ろう。フロッシャー、客人の相手を」{n}カルカサルの声は、即座に空間を移動する現象を起こす能力を持つ従者に向けられたようだ。ロード・インクィジターの声の響きが消えるより先に、模造コーヒーの入ったカップがひとつ、あなたの目の前に現れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前が異端審問庁のもてなしを受ける機会が万が一にも起きぬよう、皇帝の御慈悲を祈ろう。フロッシャー、客人の相手を」{n}カルカサルの声は、即座に空間を移動する現象を起こす能力を持つ従者に向けられたようだ。ロード・インクィジターの声の響きが消えるより先に、模造コーヒーの入ったカップがひとつ、あなたの目の前に現れる。{/n}

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur, dans sa miséricorde, vous évite de goûter personnellement à l'hospitalité de l'Inquisition. Froscher, servez notre {mf|invité|invitée}. » {n}La voix de Calcazar semble conférer au serviteur le don du déplacement instantané : une tasse de recaff apparaît devant vous alors que le seigneur inquisiteur prononce la dernière syllabe de son ordre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Empereur, dans sa miséricorde, vous évite de goûter personnellement à l'hospitalité de l'Inquisition. Froscher, servez notre {mf|invité|invitée}. » {n}La voix de Calcazar semble conférer au serviteur le don du déplacement instantané : une tasse de recaff apparaît devant vous alors que le seigneur inquisiteur prononce la dernière syllabe de son ordre.{/n}

languages.text: "Möge die Gnade des Imperators gewährleisten, dass Ihr die Gastfreundschaft der Inquisition niemals erleben müsst. Froscher, kümmert Euch um unseren Gast." {n}Calcazars Stimme scheint dem Diener die phänomenale Fähigkeit zu verleihen, sich direkt den Raum zu bewegen – die Stimme des Großinquisitors ist noch nicht verklungen, da erscheint vor dir schon eine Tasse Rekaf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Möge die Gnade des Imperators gewährleisten, dass Ihr die Gastfreundschaft der Imperator niemals erleben müsst. Froscher, kümmert Euch um unseren Gast." {n}Calcazars Stimme scheint dem Diener die phänomenale Fähigkeit zu verleihen, sich direkt den Raum zu bewegen – die Stimme des Großinquisitors ist noch nicht verklungen, da erscheint vor dir schon eine Tasse Rekaf.{/n}

languages.text: "İmparator, başına Engizisyon'un misafirperverliğini görmene sebep olacak bir iş getirmesin. Froscher, konuğumuzla ilgilen." {n}Calcazar'ın sesi, âdeta hizmetkârın dilediği yere anında gidebilmesini mümkün kılıyor. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sesi kulaklardan silinmeden önünde bir bardak kahfe beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor's mercy ensure that you never have cause to experience the hospitality of the Inquisition. Froscher, see to our guest." {n}Calcazar's voice seems to endow the servant with a phenomenal ability to move instantly through space — a cup of recaf appears in front of you before the sound of the Lord Inquisitor's voice dies away.{/n}
